channel.title: Learning on The Arboreal Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on The Arboreal Repository

item.title: A Light Roadblock
item.description: Good Problems? At the current point in the journey, I have hit a bit of a road block. Some of the skills to advance in pwn.college and picoCTF require knowledge of C. While I can read very basic C most of the way due to my experience with other languages, I cannot write it without reference. In order to progress further on both fronts I’ll need to spend some time focusing on learning C until such a time I don’t have to look every single thing up.

item.title: Linux Luminarium (pwn.college)
item.description: Linux Luminarium As agreed, I would not be doing any write-ups for pwn.college because that’s against the ground rules for their generously offered free educational material. That being said, I do want to keep record of the core skills I’ve gained through each section of their course in such a way that the notes won’t take away from the challenges - because it’s in the struggling that learning really happens.

item.title: SQL: Zero to Advanced pt. 1
item.description: materials by Bosscoder Academy, found on LinkedIn Format The materials are sorted into 24 “days” of learning, each with a central theme. My goal is to break them into 3 posts, 8 “days” each, with a distillation of the already brief material in each section as a review of SQL. 1. Introduction to SQL and Relational Databases 1.1 Content SELECT - INSERT - UPDATE - DELETE - 1.2 Practice Questions Question Answer Write a SQL query to insert a new record into the "
